timeline.message: Initial code cleanup and NPE fixing
Adding most of the layered force icon code
Refactoring to simplify the code and reduce the length of the reused code

timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: It can only match once, so it definitely should.  Fixed.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: A comment as to why this is , k would help. The iteration makes it seem like it would be , 0 or , 1.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: This is just because of how the backend is done, unfortunately. It actually sets it as having selected from k to k, inclusively, although the single selection only actually cares about the second value... Not the easiest logic to read, and I've added a comment for both places this occurs.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyText: A comment as to why this is <= (no selection or the first) would be good.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables
